title: dewilliams
author: dewilliams
content: Why did some people underrate others because they have made it in life. Nobody was born rich everybody starts from somewhere. Please people should learn how to be nice and stop underrating other people because of their wealth or because of what they have acquire some of them because of their position simple question you will ask them they will see it as an insult even if you ask them a simple question they will insult the living hell out of you please you people should learn how to be nice to other we are all women being

comments.author: hilariousandco
comments.body: I think you should care less about what others think because you have no control over it. Just be the best you.Quote from: dewilliams on April 11, 2023, 05:43:13 PMNobody was born rich everybody starts from somewhere. Lots of people are born rich.Quote from: dewilliams on April 11, 2023, 05:43:13 PMplease you people should learn how to be nice to other we are all women beingI'm not. I'm man being.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Well, you know what they say - money can't buy you class. And it certainly can't buy you manners or a sense of decency. Some people just do not know how to act right, no matter how much money they have.Personally, I think it is important to treat everyone with respect, regardless of their wealth or status. After all, you never know what someone's been through or what they are going through right now. A little empathy and understanding can go a long way. But, if you are going to be a scumbag, I have no problem with calling you out on it. I know that there are people who will disagree with me, and I respect that. Everyone has the right to their own opinion. But, when it comes down to it, being a decent human being is not really all that hard.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: people who always look down on others, just because of success in life. maybe because they are jealous. When you envy other people, you can hate them.
